Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
Hello, I am Alexis. Please check my ride status ID 213
Your driver is 8 minutes away.
Your driver is 8 minutes away.
Ugh so far away. I want my own driving directions from 5th and Main to the Hospital
departure time
When are you going to start your trip?
Right now, 8pm
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue. [instruction 2 of 6]

Turn right at the Starbucks and drive for 1.6 kilometers. Once you see a brown church, turn left on Murray
Drive for 700 meters until you reach Wilkins Avenue. It will be the first traffic light you see.
Your destination will be on the right just after the fire station.

PrimaryItem.Message: That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time.

Events.Text:
Unfortunately Michael is not able to make Saturday @ 3 pm.
Would you like to try scheduling the meeting for a different day or time?
Try anytime on Sunday. I'm flexible that day
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want X', or 'anything but Y', etc.) [instruction 4 of 6]

Events.Text: success

PrimaryItem.Message: Your meeting has been successfuly scheduled.

Events.Text: Fantastic, your meeting with Michael has been successfully scheduled for Sunday, 3 pm-5 pm.
Great, let's continue with the directions

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Alexis

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 213)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from '5th and Main' to 'Hospital') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. Chicago or Detroit)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
